column4: Hey guys, what's the most-supported, most-stable method of installing flash on AMD64?
flashplugin-nonfree or you can get 10.0 with the 64bit flash PPA
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:sevenmachines/flash && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install flashplugin64-installer
flashplugin-nonfree is 10.1 32bit running through a 64bit wrapper
